[ library(document) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

ecis_to_htmls(++LibDirs, ++HtmlTopDir, ++LinkBack)

Generate an HTML documentation tree for the given library directories
LibDirs
A list of directory path names
HtmlTopDir
A directory path name
LinkBack
HTML string (may be empty)

Description

See ecis_to_htmls/4 for details

See Also

ecis_to_htmls / 4, ecis_to_htmls / 0
